vocabulary.definition: a structure with a smooth sloping surface for children to slide down as a form of play
vocabulary.example: The water park had many exciting slides for visitors to enjoy.

vocabulary.definition: desires or wishes to have or do something
vocabulary.example: George wants to go on the big slide at the water park.

vocabulary.definition: in the future time; following (often used in the phrase 'look after' to mean take care of)
vocabulary.example: Peppa said she will look after George while he goes on the slide.

vocabulary.definition: traveling on or in a vehicle or device
vocabulary.example: Peppa and her friends were riding the slides at the water park.

vocabulary.definition: to have a particular opinion, belief, or idea about something
vocabulary.example: Peppa thinks George wants to join them on the slides.

vocabulary.definition: to take pleasure or satisfaction in an activity or experience
vocabulary.example: Visitors at the water park enjoy riding the slides and splashing in the pools.
